experiences.title: Summer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Fabrik Space - CAVE labs
workDescription: Completed an internship at PESU C-IoT, a fully funded center by PES University, in collaboration with Fabrik, a deep-tech company specializing in spatial computing solutions for industrial applications.

Contributed to the development of a web application utilizing React Three Fiber and Three.js to enable smooth handling of 3D models in both Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) environments.
